nodes.html:
<select class="form__select form__select--sm" id="language-form__select" name="language">
<option selected="" value="en">English</option>
<option value="ja">Japanese</option>
<option value="fr">French</option>
<option value="es">Spanish</option>
</select>

passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(2) > header:nth-child(2) > div > nav > h2:nth-child(2)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(3) > main > main > div > header:nth-child(1) > h1:nth-child(2)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > footer:nth-child(4) > section:nth-child(1) > h1:nth-child(1)

any.message: Heading order valid

passes.description: Ensure that links with the same accessible name serve a similar purpose
passes.help: Links with the same name must have a similar purpose

search.subject: Feedback on new Red List website

all.message: There are no other links with the same name, that go to a different URL
